question.text: How many times per week are the student toilets cleaned?

help.text:
Clean: all toilets do not have a strong smell or significant numbers of flies or mosquitos, and there is no visible faeces on the floor, walls, seat (or pan) or around the facility.                                                                                                                           Somewhat clean: there is some smell and/or some sign of faecal matter in some of the toilets. 
Not clean: there is a strong smell and/or presence of faecal matter in most toilets.
